pkgmetadata.longdescription: Portfolio Management with R // Tools for the practical management of financial portfolios: backtesting investment and trading strategies, computing profit/loss and returns, analysing trades, handling lists of transactions, reporting, and more. The package provides a small set of reliable, efficient and convenient tools for processing and analysing trade/portfolio data. The manual provides all the details; it is available from https://enricoschumann.net/R/packages/PMwR/manual/PMwR.html. Examples and descriptions of new features are provided at https://enricoschumann.net/notes/PMwR/.
